entry.title: Jimmyh-world/Cardano-explorer: A lightweight, vanilla JavaScript block explorer for the Cardano blockchain using the Blockfrost API. This project demonstrates building a secure client-server application with real-time blockchain data display.
entry.content: A lightweight, vanilla JavaScript block explorer for the Cardano blockchain using the Blockfrost API. This project demonstrates building a secure client-server application with real-time blockchain data display.

entry.title: rajtilak-2020/Notepad-Web-App: A lightweight and efficient Notepad Web App built with React (TSX), Vite, TailwindCSS, and TypeScript. It includes essential text-editing features, a status bar, and auto-save functionality.
entry.content: A lightweight and efficient Notepad Web App built with React (TSX), Vite, TailwindCSS, and TypeScript. It includes essential text-editing features, a status bar, and auto-save functionality.

entry.title: faridmth/use-konva-snapping: A lightweight React hook for adding snapping functionality to Konva.js elements. It enables elements to snap to stage borders, the center of the stage, and other shapes, with customizable guidelines and snapping sensitivity.
entry.content: A lightweight React hook for adding snapping functionality to Konva.js elements. It enables elements to snap to stage borders, the center of the stage, and other shapes, with customizable guidelines and snapping sensitivity.

entry.title: asilvafx/vite-react-boilerplate: A lightweight, production-ready boilerplate for React projects built on Vite. This setup includes essential dependencies for modern web development, such as Axios for API requests, i18n for internationalization, and React Router for route management. Includes Tailwind CSS for styling, ESLint for code quality, and support for environment variables.
entry.content: A lightweight, production-ready boilerplate for React projects built on Vite. This setup includes essential dependencies for modern web development, such as Axios for API requests, i18n for internationalization, and React Router for route management. Includes Tailwind CSS for styling, ESLint for code quality, and support for environment variables.

entry.title: rdmistra/selfhost-dl: SelfHost-DL is my project that lets users self-host a simple web downloader with minimal setup. Just run it with Node.js—no third-party services needed. Deploy the files, start the server, and download content easily. Perfect for a lightweight, self-managed solution.
entry.content: SelfHost-DL is my project that lets users self-host a simple web downloader with minimal setup. Just run it with Node.js—no third-party services needed. Deploy the files, start the server, and download content easily. Perfect for a lightweight, self-managed solution.

entry.title: trifkee/NavKit: A lightweight and flexible navigation library for handling keyboard and remote-based navigation in web and TV applications. With built-in support for directional movement, focus management, and cyclic navigation, NavKit ensures a seamless user experience across different input devices.
entry.content: A lightweight and flexible navigation library for handling keyboard and remote-based navigation in web and TV applications. With built-in support for directional movement, focus management, and cyclic navigation, NavKit ensures a seamless user experience across different input devices.
